attributes.action: ensure all your mps hold public meetings within the next 4 weeks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
all mps must hold public meetings to discuss expenses.constituency meetings where invitees only attend are both an insult and a dismissal of the electorate
its our votes that put them there our money keeps them there so we need answers.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
